net.line.lcn.upm
Interface UPMAdaptor

All Superinterfaces:
javax.ejb.EJBObject, java.rmi.Remote
public interface UPMAdaptor
extends java.rmi.Remote, javax.ejb.EJBObject

The adaptor for business application to retrieve data from LDAP directory.

The search functions in this class use Hashtable for storing seaching criteria. And use Vector for sorting criteria.

SearchByHT (Hashtable for Searching Criteria)

The searching functions use a Hashtable for communicating searching criteria.  Example:

Hashtable searchByHT = new Hashtable();
searchByHT.put( "name", "*LINE*" );
searchByHT.put( "office",  "*Asia*" );

This will give you all users (or other objects) with "LINE" in the name attribute, and belong to Asia offices.

SortByVector (Vector for Sorting Criteria)

The searching functions use a Vector for communicating sorting criteria.  The order is reserve-ordered by priority.  Example:

Vector sortByVec = new Vector();
sortByVec.add( "givenname" );
sortByVec.add( "sn" );

This makes the result the result in order of "sn" as the major sorting field, and then "givenname" as the secondary sorting field.

Method Detail

authenticate

public void authenticate(java.lang.String userID,
                         java.lang.String orgID,
                         java.lang.String userPassword,
                         boolean shallThrowException)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                         UPMException
Authenticate a user by its user ID, org ID and password.
Parameters:
userID - The login user ID. E.g. "jim.lai"
orgID - The organization ID. E.g. "DemoApp"
Throws:
UPMException - ERR_WRONG_UID_PSWD if wrong userID/orgID/password. ERR_USER_SUSPENDED if login success but suspended. ERR_USER_PASSWORD_EXPIRE if the user password expired. ERR_OVER_MAX_FAIL_ATTEMPT if too many failed attempts.

redirectToAppPage

public java.lang.String redirectToAppPage(java.lang.String fromAppName,
                                          java.lang.String toAppName,
                                          java.lang.String uid,
                                          java.lang.String orgid,
                                          java.lang.String targetFunction,
                                          java.lang.String appData)
                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                          UPMException
Generate a HTML page to bring user to another application page.
Parameters:
fromAppName - The source applicatio name. Value can lookup from AdminApp.properties. Usually self.
toAppName - The target application name. Value can lookup from AdminApp.properties. E.g. "AdminApp"
uid - The current user ID making this request.
orgid - The current user org ID making this request.
targetFunction - The target function within the target application to go to. Shall be defined in AdminApp.properties under 
LCN.AdminApp.a2a.toAppName.url.*
appData - The data to be accomplished with the request, in form of "a=b,c=d,...". Can be null.
Returns:
The generate complete HTML.

encryptAppData

public java.lang.String encryptAppData(java.lang.String fromAppName,
                                       java.lang.String toAppName,
                                       java.lang.String data)
                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                       UPMException
Decrypt received data from an application. The decryption will involve:
1) With AdminApp's private key
2) With appName's public key
Parameters:
appName - The application name where data receive from.
data - The data string.
Returns:
Encrypted string.

decryptAppData

public java.lang.String decryptAppData(java.lang.String fromAppName,
                                       java.lang.String toAppName,
                                       java.lang.String data)
                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                       UPMException
Decrypt received data from an application to another. The decryption will involve:
1) With own private key
2) With appName's public key
Parameters:
fromAppName - The application name where data receive from.
toAppName - The application name where data is sent to. Usually own application.
data - The data string.
Returns:
Decrypted string.
